paragraphs.content: A Psalm of David, when he was in the wilderness of Judah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A Psalm of David, when he was in the wilderness of Judah.

paragraphs.content: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;
paragraphs.contentHtml: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;

paragraphs.content: To see thy power and thy glory, so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To see thy power and thy glory, so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary.

paragraphs.content: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee.

paragraphs.content: Thus will I bless thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thus will I bless thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name.

paragraphs.content: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips:
paragraphs.contentHtml: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips:

paragraphs.content: When I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.
paragraphs.contentHtml: When I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.

paragraphs.content: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.

paragraphs.content: My soul followeth hard after thee: thy right hand upholdeth me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My soul followeth hard after thee: thy right hand upholdeth me.

paragraphs.content: But those that seek my soul, to destroy it, shall go into the lower parts of the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But those that seek my soul, to destroy it, shall go into the lower parts of the earth.

paragraphs.content: They shall fall by the sword: they shall be a portion for foxes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They shall fall by the sword: they shall be a portion for foxes.

paragraphs.content: But the king shall rejoice in God; every one that sweareth by him shall glory: but the mouth of them that speak lies shall be stopped.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But the king shall rejoice in God; every one that sweareth by him shall glory: but the mouth of them that speak lies shall be stopped.
